headline: Jim Cramer Says Colgate-Palmolive “Could Go Lower”
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) was mentioned during the recent episode of Mad Money on May 14, and here’s what Mad Money’s host had to say: “I’ve always believed that there are two consumer packaged goods companies that make a ton of sense whenever they go down, and that’s Procter & Gamble and Colgate… Colgate’s worse. Again, […]
